thread.title: Easy and simple - exactly what I needed...
thread.title_full: Easy and simple - exactly what I needed... - Review of Hilton London Angel Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: marcusholford
title: Easy and simple - exactly what I needed...
text: Great hotel, well located - perfect for a business stopover - pretty good value. I stayed on the fourth floor, at the back of the building and away from the elevator which was quiet and I wouldn't have known I was in London! Worth getting The Hilton Ap so you can check in in advance and choose a high and therefore quiet room...
